BRIEF-P B M Polytex Ltd Says Production Loss At Petlad Unit Due To Shortage Of Workers Oct 21 (Reuters) - P B M Polytex Ltd : * P B M POLYTEX LTD SAYS PRODUCTION LOSS AT PETLAD UNIT OF COMPANY ON ACCOUNT OF SHORTAGE OF WORKERS * P B M POLYTEX -ON ACCOUNT OF RECESSION IN YARN MARKET, CO STOPPED PRODUCTION FOR ONE DAY IN EVERY WEEK AT BORGAON UNIT OF CO UNTIL FURTHER DECISION.
